bug.author: mtzfei
bug.description:
Organization Name:qingdoaxinuozhineng : Error starting openpai service /bin/bash quick-start-service.sh -m /path/to/master.csv -w /path/to/worker.csv -c /path/to/config <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/60864045/83399451-d4480b00-a433-11ea-9e6a-44a6e2ca0943.png></denchmark-link>
Brief what process you are following: How to reproduce it: OpenPAI Environment:
OpenPAI version: Cloud provider or hardware configuration: OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): Kernel (e.g. uname -a): Hardware (e.g. core number, memory size, storage size, GPU type etc.): Others:
Anything else we need to know:

comments.comment: Same here. Since error is svn not found, a simple solution is to add apt-get install subversion in script/service-boot.sh, for example, at Line 44.

apt-get install subversion could fix it, but the svn is only included in master and v1.0.1 instead of v1.0.0. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mtzfei>@mtzfei</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/k1ngcyk>@k1ngcyk</denchmark-link> Could you share the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/pai/blob/v1.0.0/contrib/kubespray/example/config.yml#L3>branch_name</denchmark-link> you used in config?

branch_name: pai-1.0.y
Thanks for reporting. It's suggested to use v1.0.0 which points to a specific commit and won't change, instead of pai-1.0.y. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hzy46>@hzy46</denchmark-link> pls help to fix your docs accordingly.
OK, I will fix the doc accordingly.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/abuccts>@abuccts</denchmark-link> I found this problem can't be resolved by changing the doc. Because in quick start script config, there is setting like . So the code used during deployment is always . Add <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ydye>@ydye</denchmark-link> for help.
